Traits.Name: Sturdy
Traits.Description: Immune to shove, daze, and stun.

Actions.Name: Clobber
Actions.Effect: Foe must save or become dazed. If already dazed, they are stunned instead on a failed save.

Actions.Name: Hurl
Actions.Description: The Brute picks up an adjacent character, piece of created terrain, or summon and shoves them 3.
